scripts.be:init: npm run i1 && npm run i2 && npm run i3 && npm run i4 && npm run i5
scripts.i4: npm run be:composer:install && npm run be:migrate && npm run be:key:generate && npm run permissions:fix
scripts.be:composer:install: docker exec -it --user www:www-data trenchdevs-backend composer install
scripts.be:migrate: docker exec -it --user www:www-data trenchdevs-backend php artisan migrate
scripts.be:key:generate: docker exec -it --user www:www-data trenchdevs-backend php artisan key:generate
scripts.permissions:fix: docker exec -i trenchdevs-backend bash -c 'chown -R www:www-data /var/www/storage /var/www/resources && chmod ug+w -R /var/www/storage /var/www/resources'
